translation: The enjoyments that arise from contact are only sources of pain, for they have a beginning and an end, O Arjuna; the wise do not rejoice in them.
commentary: 5.22 These which? Hi verily? Contactborn: contactborn? Bhogas enjoyments? Dukhyonayah generators of pain? Eve only? And they? Adyantavantah having beginning and end? Kaunteya Or Kaunteya? Not not? in those in those? Enjoying rejoices? Mercury the wise.Commentary Man goes in est of joy and searches in the external perishable objects for his happiness. He fails to get it but instead carries a load of sorrow on his head.You
